problem.markdown:
1. 2A binary-weighted digital-to-analog converter has an input resistor of 100 k . If the () 500 A () 5 mA (x) 50 uA () 50 mA
2) The difference between analog voltage represented by two adjacent digital codes, or the analog step size, is the: () Accuracy (x) Resolution () Quantization () None of these
3) The resolution of a 0–5 V 6-bit digital-to-analog converter (DAC) is: (x) 1.56% () 63% () 64% () 6.3%
4) The number of binary bits at the input of a digital-to-analog converter (DAC) is known as ________ () Precision () Accuracy () Linearity (x) Resolution
